name: Apple Cider Balancing Kit
description:
Apple Cider Vinegar has long been proven to be very effective in balancing the pH levels of scalp, removing product build up, dirt and controlling dandruff.


We have infused oils to make this with hair loving herbs of, horsetail, marshmallow root, nettles and comfrey in combination that  give your hair and scalp fabulous shine and conditioning. Nettles have also been cited as encouraging hair growth while the emollient properties of marshmallow root softens and horsetail is loaded with silica and helps strengthen the hair shaft and split ends. Lavendar oil is added as the herb draws the blood to the scalp, which helps prevent hair loss. Hence, lavender is seen to be effective in combating balding and promoting hair 
growth.

Kit Contains :
Apple Cider Balancing Shampoo - cleansing and balancing - 8oz.

Apple Cider Balancing Conditioner - conditioning and balancing - 16oz.

Apple Cider Vinegar Spritz - build up remover and pH balancer - 4oz.

Ingredients :

shampoo - distilled water, apple cider vinegar, castile soap, lavender essential oil, horsetail, nettles, marshmallow root, comfrey, tea tree oil

Conditioner - distilled water, apple cider vinegar, btms. lavender essential oil, horsetail, nettles, marshmallow root, comfrey

Spritz - apple cider vinegar, lemongrass, lemon essential oil

pH Balanced

name: Shi-Aloe Oil
description:
This multi purpose aloe oil infused with the powerful combination of soybean and biotin, repairs dry damaged, breaking hair. When used regularly will strengthen and enhance shine. Excellent for all hair textures.


How to use:

as a pre-poo treatment - oil hair and scalp 15 to 30 minutes before washing or co-washing

as a sealing oil - after washing or co-washing. Apply your leave-in, then seal with the shi-aloe oil (3-6 drops only needed depending on hair length)

as a leave-in - add a few drops to your favorite leave in for extra strengthening.


Ingredients: aloe vera oil, soybean oil, biotin, omega 3 fatty acids

8oz.

name: Peppermint Stimulating Shampoo
description:
This peppermint stimulating shampoo is invigorating. Infused with moisturizing herbs to leave hair and scalp clean and tingling. Is part 1 of our peppermint combo. This shampoo contains no sulfates or parabens.


How to use:  

On wet hair, apply a quater size amount spread on fingers. Place fingers on scalp and massage in gently. Cover the entire scalp area. Rinse & repeat (optional-a second wash is only needed for product build up)

On dry hair : apply to scalp area with fingers or applicator, in 1 inch partings. Cover the entire scalp area. Massage in gently. Rinse & repeat (optional-a second wash is only needed for product build up)



Ingredients: Distilled water, Saponifed coconut, Olive oil, Hempseed oil, Glycerine, Vitamin E, Citrus Acid, Peppermint oil, Rosemary.

ph balanced - 8oz

name: Peppermint Stimulating Deep Conditioner
description:
This peppermint stimulating conditioner is a combination balancing conditioner. It adds moisture and protein, plus the powerful peppermint for hair growth. Together with the Peppermint Stimulating Shampoo. Packs a powerful combo for  growth and healthy hair.

How to use: Apply generously from root to end. Apply plastic cap. Wrap towel around head or sit under a hood dryer or steamer. Process 30-60 minutes without heat, 15-30 with heat.

Ingredients: Distilled water, btms, natural peppermint oil, almond oil, castor oil, hydrolized protein, silk protein

ph balanced - 16 oz

name: Coconut Creme Shampoo
description:
Luxurious creamy  shampoo for all you coconut lovers. Leaves hair clean, moist and hydrated with the tropical scent of coconuts. Does not contain sulfates or parabens.


How to use:

On wet hair, apply a quater size amount spread on fingers. Place fingers on scalp and massage in gently. Cover the entire scalp area. Rinse & repeat (optional-a second wash is only needed for product build up)

On dry hair : apply to scalp area with fingers or applicator, in 1 inch partings. Cover the entire scalp area. Massage in gently. Rinse & repeat (optional-a second wash is only needed for product build up)


Ingredients: Distilled water, saponified coconut coconut milk, coconut creme,  coconut oil, grapeseed oil, coconut essential oil

ph balanced - 8oz

name: Coconut Creme Deep Conditioner
description:
This creamy coconut conditioner coats your strands in moisture and strengthens with coconut oil.


How to use : 
1. After washing or co-washing, apply generously from roots to ends.

2. Put on plastic cap and wrap a towel around head. Let your body heat process conditioner, or put on plastic cap and sit under a hooded dryer or steamer. Conditioner can also be applied on dry hair (then follow #2-3)

3. Process 15-30 minutes with heat (optional)
    Process 30-60 minutes without heat (optional)


Ingredients: Distilled water Coconut milk, coconut oil, btms, silk protein, coconut essential oil 

ph balanced - 16 oz

name: Shi-Smooth Transition  Kit
description:
Nourish and protect your different textures as you transition to your natural hair.

4 Piece Kit  Contains :

Olive & Almond Oil Softening Shampoo - 8oz.
Distilled water, olive oil, almond oil, castile soap, btms, marshmallow root, aloe vera gel, chamomile, comfrey, burdock, grapefruitseed oil, vitamin E, silk protein, citus acid, essential oil for fragrance.


Olive & Almond Oil Softening Conditioner - 16 oz.
Ingredients:
Distilled water, olive oil, almond oil, btms, marshmallow root, aloe vera gel, chamomile, comfrey, burdock, grapefruitseed oil, vitamin E, silk protein, essential oil for fragrance.


Stretch It Cream - 8oz.
Ingredients:
Distilled water, olive oil, almond oil, btms, marshmallow root, aloe vera gel, chamomile, comfrey, burdock, grapefruitseed oil, vitamin E, essential oil for fragrance.


Repairing Liquid Pomade  - 4oz.
Ingredients:
soybean oil, olive oil, almond oil, aloe vera, msm, biotin, hydrolyzed wheat protein, wheat starch, grapefruitseed oil, essential oil for fragrance

How to use :
Shampoo with Smooth Transition (step 1)
apply to scalp and hair. massage scalp gently keeping hair in a downward direction to prevent tangling , rinse, repeat (optional) 

Condition with Smooth Transition Olive & Almond Oil Softening Conditioner (Step 2) 
apply generously to roots and entire length of hair. Process 15-30 minutes with heat. 45-60 minutes without heat

Smooth on Stretch Cream on new growth while hair is damp, smoothing new growth with fingers, or comb, or soft bristle brush, or baby toothbrush. Can be used on dry, damp or wet hair. Can be used daily. (step 3)

Apply Repairing Liquid Pomade to length of hair. Great for ends and sealing. Can be used daily.Concentrated formulation. Only a few drops needed for the entire head. (Step 4)

name: Mega Detangling Hair Spritz
description:
This moisturizing formulation melts knots and tangles. Won't leave hair dry or crunchy. Moisturizes with no sticky residue, and rinses out clean. For use on wet or dry hair. How to use : Spray on hair. Concentrate on areas where there is tangling. Let sit on hair for a minute to let the formula soften knots and tangles. Gently separate knots and tangles with fingers and/or a wide tooth comb. Then comb gently from ends to roots. Do not oversaturate hair. Can be used on wet or dry hair. Whenever you have tangle issues.

♥Ingredients♥ orange water, walnut oil, vegetable glycerin, flaxseed gel, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

name: Garlic Conditioner For Shedding
description:
Garlic is a powerful herb. Used for centuries as an aid for hair fall and excessive shedding. Our garlic infused conditioner moisturizes and stops shedding.

How to use : Apply generously to scalp and roots making sure scalp is completely drenched in this conditioner. Apply more to the length entire length of strands. Deep condition using a plastic cap, with or without heat.

Without heat - 1 hour
With heat - 15 to 30 minutes

Rinse, style or continue with a conditioner of choice (optional)

continue use weekly or twice weekly until shedding stops. Then use monthly to keep shedding at bay

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>  distilled water, garlic, btms conditioner, shea butter, walnut seed oil, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

name: Nada-Poo Co-wash Conditioner
description:
Nada-Poo cleansing conditioner. Wash you hair without the harsh chemicals that dry and strip delicate strands. Bath your hair in moisture. All natural and organic. Does not contain sulfates or parabens

How to use : Use in place of your regular shampoo or alternate between your shampoo.

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> Distilled water, orange water, btms conditioner, shea butter, almond oil, coconut oil, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

Apply to entire length of hair and scalp. Massage gently for a few minutes or leave on hair 5-30 minutes for extra conditioning. Rinse, then apply your deep conditioner (optional)
Stlye as usual

ph balanced 4.0 - 6.0

name: Henna Gloss Thickening & Strengthening Conditioner
description:
Organic henna & moisturizing conditioner, herb infused oil combined to give thickness & strength to strands. Acts like a protein conditioner on the hair. Does not contain protein. 

How to use : 
1. detangle hair, apply generously from root to ends (wear plastic gloves) in sections until all hair is covered
2. place plastic cap on head (make sure all hair is inside the plastic cap, twist up hair if your hair is long to fit in cap
3. Wrap a towel around head over the plastic cap (body heat will keep the henna gloss moist and will help henna adhere to hair strands)
4. leave on hair for at least 1 hour
5. Rinse, rinse, rinse until all henna is completely out - water will run clear
6. Co-wash or use a moisturizing conditioner to soften hair. Some skip this step
7. style (i suggest your leave in at this step and moisturize & seal)

Enjoy you strong thick hair!!
                     
<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> Organic neutral henna (no color), orange water, btms conditioner, grapeseed oil, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

*Henna for color is a custom order*
custom colors : black, burgundy, copper

name: Shi-Naturals Henna
description:
Henna has been used for 100's of years to color, strengthen and thicken hair. 

100% Natural and organic. Finely sifted. No metallics or artificial colors added
Body Art quality (this is the only type of henna recommended for use on hair)

How to use:
mix with water to make a paste (can also add lemon juice for color release).
Section hair and apply generously from roots to ends of hair strands.
Put on a plastic cap and process for 1 hour to overnight
Rinse well until all henna is removed and water runs clear!

Optional : If hair is dry, apply a moisturizing conditioner, after rinsing apply - leave in, moisturize and seal (with oil)

Proceed with styling!!

100 grams

name: Neem Powder
description:
The antiseptic and curative properties of Neem are legendary.  Neem powder can also be used on hair for treating acute dandruff problems. When used on skin,  Neem powder has a germicidal and anti bacterial action that can help allergies, bed sores, prickly heat and rashes. It also helps to remove excessive oiliness from the skin and helps fight skin disorders and eruptions. An anti-bacterial & anti-dandruff powder.

How to use :
 
For dandruff - mix with distilled or spring water to make a paste. Apply to scalp and hair for 30 minutes. Use 1x a month. If dandruff is extreme. Use 2x month until dandruff is cleared. Use anytime if dandruff returns.

For skin -  mix with distilled or spring water to make a paste. It is a great face mask for anti-bacterial purposes. Works to heal acne. Can be used for nicks and cuts, injuries and skin burns.


Ingredients : Neem leaf powder - 100g

name: Shikakai Powder
description:
Shikakai Powder acts as a natural astringent for hair enhancing its binding properties. It clears dandruff and cleans the dirt accumulated in the scalp. Being a natural conditioner for hair, Shikakai strengthens hair roots and promotes luxuriant growth.  Shikakai Powder has certain vital proprieties that act as coolants for the scalp. This powder has to be mixed with appropriate quantity of water and used as a paste on the hair, instead of the soap.

• Provides new life to hair strands
• Strengthens hair roots
• Clears dandruff
• Keeps the scalp clean and cool

How to use : Add distilled or spring water to make a paste. Apply to scalp and hair. Massage gently, rinse.Other ayurvedic herbs can be added for extra benefits. Ex: Alma, brahmi, etc.

Ingredients : Shikakai (Acacia Concinna) 100g

name: Moisture Balance Deep Conditioner
description:
This  all natural creamy conditioner will moisturize thirsty hair without weighing down your strands. Works for natural and relaxed textures

How to use :

On wet hair - apply a generous amount from root to ends. Making sure to cover all strands. Place plastic cap on head. Cover head with towel or use a hooded dryer to process for 30 minutes. Rinse and style

On dry hair - apply a generous amount from root to ends. Making sure to cover all strands. Place plastic cap on head. Cover head with towel or use  with or without heat. process for 30 minutes with heat or 45 minutes without heat. Rinse and style.

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> shea butter, grapseed oil, almond oil, BTMS, coconut milk, vitamin E, grapefruit seed oil, essential oil for fragrance

ph balanced

name: L.O.C. Kit
description:
The L.O.C. (Liquid Oil Cream) method is a 3 step application of products, scientifically one of the best ways to moisturize and keep moisture the hair.

How it works : 
1. liquid phase - apply the liquid to moisturize hair strands. Can be used on dry, wet or damp hair.

2. Oil phase - apply the oil after the liquid phase. This will seal in the moisture.

3. Cream phase - apply the cream to seal in the first and second phases for prolonged moisture retention.

Why it works:
Curly and dry hair textures need moisture to thrive. When moisture is not in the hair. Breakage can occur. Moisture imparts elasticity and strength into hair strands. Making hair more able to handle the stress of every day maintenance.

These 3 steps lock moisture into the hair strands.

name: Pre-poo ButterCreme
description:
This 3 butters pre-poo leaves hair buttery soft and will buffer the harsh effects of shampoo in your precious strands.

What does it mean to pre-poo?

Pre-poo is a term used for pre-shampoo. It is a treatment used before shampooing to lessen the harsh effects of shampoo. A pre-shampoo treatment, which is applied to the hair and/or scalp, left on for a period of time and then shampooed out.

What are the benefits?

Using an oil or a conditioner can help provide a barrier between the hair and the harsh detergents in the shampoo.

How To Pre-Poo :

You can pre-poo overnight or 30 minutes to 1 hour or more before shampooing or co-washing

1.Apply your pre-poo of choice from roots to tips making sure you cover all hair strands, on damp (use a spray bottle with water to dampen hair)  or dry hair.


2.Put on a plastic cap or wrap head in saran wrap.


3,You sit under a dryer or just let you
 pre-poo stay on your hair for as long as you feel.


4.Rinse and style as usual


<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>Shea butter, almond butter, coco butter, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

name: Creamy Leave-in
description:
This creamy formulation is great for dry thirsty hair. Use as a moisturizing leave in after wash or daily. Will not build up on strands. Your hair will be so soft!

Light Leave-In formulation/or Heavy Leave-In formulation


How to use: After rinsing, apply a quarter size amount to damp hair, from root to ends. Seal with oil (optional)
Proceed to styling


Ingredients: light formulation
shea butter, grapeseed oil, almond oil, aloe vera juice, castor oil, organic lavendar, rosa  mosqueta seed oil (rose hips), vitamin E, grapefruit seed oil

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> Heavy formulation
shea butter, grapeseed oil, aloe vera gel, lemon oil, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil

Choose your fragrance from the drop down box

options.name: Najama Heavy creme for extra dry hair

name: Kurl Pop - Curl define pudding
description:
Moisturizing curl defining pudding. Can be used on all textures to define curls without hardness or stickiness. Rinses out clean. Leaves hair moisturized and buttery soft. Excellent for use with the "Curly Girl Method".

Two-Strand Twists, Twist Outs, Braid Outs, Bantu Knots, Coils, Coil Outs, Afro's, Wash & Go's, Natuals & Relaxed, Stretching

How to use : apply to wet or damp hair. Use a dime to quater size amount depending on hair thickness. Section damp or wet hair and apply. 

For two strand twist, twist outs, braid outs, bantu knots, coils, col outs - apply to each section and let dry completely. Style

For wash & go's - apply a generous amount. Dry completely (can also use hair dryer-do not disturb curls until dry to prevent frizzing)

Afro's - apply generous amount to wet or damp hair. Braid, twist, bantu knot, finger comb or comb thru gently to define curls. Let dry completely. Separate curls with fingers

Relaxed - apply dime to quater amount to wet or damp hair for braidouts, twists, bantu knots, slick back. Dry completely. Use perm rods to curl ends for braidouts (optional)

Stretching - apply to new growth (lay down new growth with a silk scarf/optional) moisturize & seal relaxed ends

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>
distilled water, aloe vera gel, castor oil, shea butter, flaxseed gel, vitamin E, grapefruitseed oil, citrus acid


ph balanced

name: Lemonade Shampoo
description:
Delightful smelling shampoo- made with all natural ingredients, no sulfates, or stripping agents. Will leave hair soft and moisturized. Lemon scented. Great as a clarifying shampoo.
Can be used on all textures, natural, relaxed, curly, straight

Multi-purpose - can be used on face & body

How to use: 
Wet hair. A quarter size amount is all that is needed. Apply to scalp only. Let the run-off clean the length of the strands.
Rinse and proceed to use leave-in (optional)

To clarify- use a quarter size amount on scalp and hair.
Rinse and proceed to use leave-in (optional)

tip: pre-poo with oil before shampooing, overnight or 20 minutes to 1 hour, then shampoo

name: Scalp Detox
description:
For healthy strong hair to grow, the scalp must be completely free of excess oils and dead cells. This causes the blood to flow freely through the scalp. Use the scalp detox to clean, stimulate blood circulation and growth. Detoxing the scalp is the most effective way to dissolve  buildup and remove dead cells caused by improper washing, and rinsing. these impurities as well as dust and pollution clog the pores of the scalp and smother the root before the hair has a chance to grow!!

How to use : before washing or co-washing, apply to scalp only. gently massage into scalp area covering the entire scalp. massage for at least 1 minute to 5 minutes. After massaging in, spread through hair (optional) if there is a lot of build up.

Rinse or add your conditioner right on top of the scalp detox

after final rinse. Style as usual


<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> witch hazel, asprin, seltzer, cayenne pepper, basil, lavendar, rosemary, castile soap, distilled water

name: Grow Potion
description:
Now you grow your hair faster and longer. Have Longer, Healthier Hair!

With our  Grow Potion  Hair Growth Excelerator Oil Formula, it is possible to see hair growth within a few days of use. Many  are seeing remarkable fast growth from this product. Our Grow Potion Hair Growth Excelerator oil speeds up growth, moisturizes the hair and scalp. It actually assists in healing the scalp. The hair oil stimulates circulation in the scalp, which brings oxygen to the follicles, assists in unclogging the pores. Assists in growing and thickening. It also softens the hair and gives it a healthy shine. If you are looking for fast hair growth. *It is not unusual to grow from 1-2 inches a month!!!

The Growth Potion Excelerator is formulated with natural and organic herbal blend for the Hair to produce fast growth. 

How to use : apply all over scalp daily for best results (if you don't want to use daily, apply at least twice weekly). Massage gently in a circular motion. make sure all scalp is covered. Washing or co-washing twice a week is recommended. A clean scalp yields better results. Another excellent way to use is overnight then washing out/co-washing out in the morning. 
Make sure to cover head with a silk scarf and a towel on your pillowcase  for protection of your pillowcase should any oil seep out.

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font> Heavy formulation

castor oil, garlic oil, sulfur, organic saw palmetto, organic black tea, organic cayenne, biotin, other organic ingredients, grapefruitseed oil (preservative), Vitamin E (preservative)


<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>Light Formulation 

grapeseed oil, garlic oil, sulfur, organic saw palmetto, organic black tea, organic cayenne, biotin, other organic ingredients, grapefruitseed oil (preservative), Vitamin E (preservative)



Castor Oil - thickens hair strands and strengthens hair. Also adds moisture

Garlic Oil -  promotes growth in thin and balding areas

Sulfur -  the nutrient sulfur which aids the hair follicle, increasing hair growth rapidly

Organic Saw Palmetto - Blocks DHT (Dihydrotestosterone) which causes hair loss and shrinking of the follicles.

Organic Black Tea - helps stop shedding, soothes scalp, strengthens strands

Organic Cayenne Pepper - stimulates the scalp, surges blood flow to the scalp,and is the optimal condition for hair growth. which feeds papilla and hair grows  much faster.

Biotin - (vitamin B7) provides fuel  to the scalp for rapid hair growth.

*New*

*New*
Pomade - formulated with aloe vera for growth and moisturization

*Individual results may vary

*New*
3 oz. more

name: V.I.P. Membership
description:
With membership you are officially a Shi-Naturals  V.I.P.  We created this loyalty program to benefit our customers. With your Shi-Naturals Membership you get: 10% off all future orders for 12 months Special members’ only promotions, sale notifications and coupon codes Exclusive email updates on new item releases before anyone else 

**How to Register** 
1. Add Membership Card at checkout

2. Within 24 hours you will receive an email with your personal coupon code to use for the next 12 months. . 10% discount does not apply to shipping costs. You will not get an actual membership card in the mail, but we will have your membership information and code saved in our database.

Code codes are not transferable.  Shi-Naturals LLC reserves the right to revoke your membership. Membership code can only be used for shipment to the registered person. Membership discount does not  apply to the order membership is purchased in Registration is effective  from date coupon code issued and valid for 12 months.

1. 10% discount on all products - 12 month code
2. member only sales
3. new product advance notice
4. birthday free product - request once a year by email
5. free event entry
and much more......

description:
Pack of 10 conditioning caps. Used for deep conditioning, henna treatments, coloring, hot oil treatments, etc.

Use with or without heat. Disposable after a few uses!

name: Applicator Tip

name: Satin Pillowcases
description:
Satin pillowcases  reduce hair breakage and protects hairstyles, maintains moisture balance, and is machine washable. It’s soft on the hair, yet strong enough not to deteriorate through repeated washings.

Standard pillowcase with zipper

The benefits of sleeping on a satin pillowcase :

Your hair comes in contact with one thing more than any other: "the pillowcase.”

haircare specialists have recommended the use of satin pillowcases. Cotton may feel soft to the skin but its weave actually grips and tugs at individual strands causing damage and breakage. The effects of continuous contact with cotton pillowcases can tangle and ultimately ruin hair

Hair treated by bleaching, highlighting, coloring, chemical perms, relaxers, blow dryers, and curling irons are  especially susceptible to breakage. For braided, chemically treated or normal hair, the use of a satin pillowcase:

    * reduces hair breakage
    * helps maintain proper moisture balance
    * protects hairstyles
    * eliminates most tangling

To keep your style fresh for days, sleep on satin pillowcases. Unlike cotton pillowcases, which can snag hair, satin pillowcases allow hair to glide over them, reducing tangles. 
Satin  pillowcases benefit hair treated by bleaching, chemical perms or relaxers and are an ideal remedy for preventing color-treated and highlighted hair from drying out. Your hair comes in contact with one thing more than any other – the pillowcase. We are aware of the damaging effects of cotton pillowcases, and the advantages they will quickly discover by switching to satin.

name: Whipped Cream Body Butter
description:
This yummy moisturizing body and hair butter is just perfect for skin and hair. This thick creamy formula with anti-oxidants will keep your skin smooth and supple. Delicious flavors will keep your skin looking good and smelling good.

Ingredients : Shea butter, aloe, grapseed oil, almond oil, vitamin E, fragrance

How to use : 

For skin - Apply on slightly damp skin to lock in moisture. Can also be applied daily on dry skin
Contains natural anti-oxidant oils

For hair - Several uses. For pre-poo's, sealing, hot oil treatments (heat butter until melted) can be used daily. Contains anti-oxidant oils

name: Double Chocolate Butter Scrub
description:
This decadent chocolate body scrub is created with organic Brown sugar, shea butter, almond oil, grapeseed oil, vitamin E for a 100% natural indulgence. Believe in the power of chocolate… What is it?
Chocolusious for dry, lackluster skin.  this chocolate body scrub will work its magic from your head to your toe

How to use:
While bathing, massage chocolate scrub onto skin using gentle circular motions. Focus on dry, rough patches and use several times per week; rinse well. rinse with warm water, leaving the skin silky soft but never greasy. 

Who can use it?
Scrub lovers, soft skin lovers, and chocoholics.

Why you can't live without it?
Our Double Chocolate Sugar Scrub is a decadent chocolate  chocolate sugar scrub that gently scrubs away dead cells which dull the skin’s surface it hydrates and nourishes with natural vitamins, sheabutter and potent antioxidants. Open a jar and a smell the chocolate goodness!

This product can be used for pedicure, facial and all over body smoothness.

name: Chocolate Milk Bath
description:
Treat yourself to the softening, soothing & moisturizing qualities of a milk bath


Take a cleansing shower, then run a bath, toss a cup of milk bath into running water. and enjoy a long soak in milk and antioxidant oils.

Step out feeling refreshed and relaxed!!!
<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>
milk powder,  corn starch,  organic coco powder,  epsom salt,  sweet almond oil,  grape seed oil,  vitamin e oil, grapefruit seed oil

name: Soothing Pretty Feet Soak
description:
When your feet are aching and tired, these foot soak salts will put some pep back into your step. Use as a part of your pedicure or just for a soothing soak.  Experience the healing properties of Epsom salt, the detoxifying power of sea salts,  and the softening effects of baking soda, and the refreshing scent of citrus. Your pretty feet will thank you!!


How to use :
Fill pedicure basin with water, pour 2-4 ounces of the soothing pretty feet soak in water. Let feet soak 15 - 20 minutes. Use a pumice stone to remove dead skin (optional). Proceed with pedicure.

Tip: Apply a moisturizing oil or lotion to feet after drying off

<font color="000000" face="arial" size="3">♥Ingredients♥</font>
Baking soda, epsom salt, citrus acid, corn starch, almond oil, grapeseed oil, essential oils, purified water, fragrance, food coloring, 

8-10 soaks

32 oz.

You must have or register for a PayPal account to redeem this gift certificate. (To register, click Sign Up now .) 3.
